sentence.Network_en: In the fully plastic condition, the neutral axis does not necessarily pass through the centroid.
sentence.Network_cn: 在全塑状态下, 中性轴不一定需要通过形心.

sentence.Network_en: Centroid tracking algorithm is widely used because of its simplicity and quick run speed.
sentence.Network_cn: 形心跟踪算法因为简单、执行速度快而得到广泛采用.

sentence.Network_en: A new method for seam tracking using image centroid in gas tungsten arc welding is presented.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究一种基于图像质心识别的电弧焊焊缝跟踪新方法.
